value.title: Azure Service Fabric Mesh preview | Azure Friday

Service Fabric Mesh supports both Windows and Linux

value.title: Calculating isochrones in Azure Maps | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Julie Kohler joins Scott Hanselman and shows you how you can generate an isochrone using Azure Maps.
